channel.description: Add the user groups claim Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: This doc is under Manage user accounts because it discuss return the user’s group information Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Customize tokens returned from Okta with a Groups claim: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/customize-tokens-groups-claim/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.
